sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ChoiceListDiffer</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Diff logic specific to Choice Lists</description>
        <name>ChoiceListDiffer</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ChoiceListDiffer = Class.create();

ChoiceListDiffer.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ListDiffer, {
    _getFieldType: function(){
        return "label";
    },
    
    getURL: function(root){
        var url = "sys_choice_list.do?sysparm_query=";
        var table = root.getAttribute("table");
        var element = root.getElementsByTagName("element").item(0).getFirstChild().getNodeValue();
        
        return url + "name=" + table + "^element=" + element;
    },
    
    _getParentRecord: function(root){
        var element = root.getAttribute("field");
        var name = root.getAttribute("table");
        var gr = new GlideRecord(root.getTagName());
        gr.addQuery("element", element);
        gr.addQuery("name", name);
        gr.query();
        return gr;
    }
    
});
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>juell.solaegui</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2010-03-22 22:58:48</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8817ad560a0a0bb0000f2fddf4994d7d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ChoiceListDiffer</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System Diagnostics" source="com.glide.ui.diagnostics">13f0c1cb6d2620100acb70b353433029</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8817ad560a0a0bb0000f2fddf4994d7d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-09-21 23:04:32</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>828</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
